description.part1: Discover answers to frequently asked questions about our cleaning services, including details on scheduling, pricing, service options, and the

items.question: Do I need to be home during the cleaning?
items.answer: No, you do not need to be home during the cleaning. Our team is trained to work efficiently without supervision.

items.question: What is your cancellation policy?
items.answer: You can cancel or reschedule up to 24 hours before your appointment without any charge.

items.question: What are your payment options?
items.answer: We accept various payment methods including credit cards.

items.question: Are your cleaners insured and background-checked?
items.answer: Yes, all our cleaners are fully insured and have passed rigorous background checks.
